subject: Alone We Can Do Little,But Together We Can Archive A Lot.
body:
Attn/Pls Dear,

I would like to apply through this medium for your cooperation and to
secure an opportunity to invest and do joint business with you in your
country. I have a substantial capital i honorably intend to invest in your
country into a very lucrative business venture of which you are to advise
and execute the said venture over there for the mutual benefits of both of
us.

My name is Lara Davidson Dean, a widow with stage 4 cancer. There is
something very important i want to discuss and share with you. Please can i
trust you. I saw your email in my search for someone i can trust to assist
and utilize the proceeds realized from my time i have been working and my
investments for years before i became sick and very unwell to continue for
charity, basically helping the less privileged, widows and orphans because
according to the doctors my days are numbered.

Your able cooperation is to become my business partner in your country and
create ideas on how money will be invested,properly managed and the type of
investment after the money is transferred to your custody with your help
and assistance.

Meanwhile,on indication of your willingness to handle this transaction
sincerely by protecting our interests and upon your acceptance of this
proposal,I would furnish you with the full detailed information,
procedure,amount involve and mutually agree on your percentage interest or
share holding for helping me to secure the release of the deposit and
investing the money in your country under your proper management and care.

I shall be glad to reserve this respect and opportunity for you,if you so
desire,but do urge you to give the matter your immediate attention it
deserves. If this proposal is acceptable by you,please do not make undue
advantage of the trust i bestow on you,and your urgent reply is highly
needed,for more details information.

Looking forward to your candid and urgent reply today and for a mutual
healthy business relationship with you,

Best regards,and have a great day.
Yours Faithfully,
Ms.Lara Davidson Dean.
My e-mail ;   mslaradavidsondean@gmail.com

subject: Re: Alone We Can Do Little,But Together We Can Archive A Lot.
body:
Dear Davidson Dean,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition. It's a tough situation and I admire your courage in dealing with it. Your intention to help the less fortunate is truly commendable.

As for your business proposal, I must admit that I'm not very experienced in these matters. However, I am interested in learning more about it. Could you please provide me with more details? What kind of business venture are we talking about? And how can I assist you in this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Dennis

subject: Re: Alone We Can Do Little,But Together We Can Archive A Lot.
body:
Dear Davidson Dean,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition. It's a tough situation and I appreciate your courage in dealing with it. 

Your proposal sounds interesting, but I would like to understand more about it. Could you please provide more details about the type of business venture you are considering? Also, could you explain how the investment process would work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Dennis

subject: Re: Alone We Can Do Little,But Together We Can Archive A Lot.
body:
My Dearest Beloved Dennis,

Please dear i want you to know and understand that i did not just wake up
one morning and decide to contact you for this,i prayed to God to direct me
to a good person whom i will send this money to and that will use it for
charity work,i believe that God knows why we meet.

So from the bottom of my heart and in the name of the most high God i
promise and assure you that this is real and not a play or a game and it is
not a scam and will never ever be a scam i am a born again christian with a
conscience and a fear of God and i will never ever involve myself in a scam
or any illegal activities that does not please God almighty.

Thanks so much for your email response of today February 15,2024,with the
contents therein are well noted and appreciated wholeheartedly. How are you
today together with your family and work? hope all is well with you and
your family. I just want to let you know that i would have love to talk to
you over the phone but the problem is that because of my health conditions
couple with the pains,the doctors advise me to stop receiving calls,due to
the condition of my health which is deteriorating every day.

Once again,my name is Ms.Lara Davidson Dean,I am 54 years old i am dropping
this message from my sick bed presently i'm staying in Dakar-Senegal.l have
been working as a human rights activist and a humanitarian coordinator with
my husband for 19 years before i became sick and very unwell to continue
the work that i started with my husband.I`m married to Mr.Davidson Dean,We
were married for 11 years without a child.He died after a brief illness and
before his death,we were both born again Christian.Since his death,I
decided not to re-marry or get a child outside my matrimonial home.

When i was the coordinator of the major human right action group in
Southern Sudan,I deposited the sum of us$1.8M ( One Million Eight Hundred
Thousand United States Dollars) in a ( Financial Holding Co.) here in
Dakar-Senegal.One very important fact is that i did declared to the
(Financial Holding Co.) here as Undisclosed Item-Family Treasure at the
time i made the deposit for safety and security reasons,which means that
the (Financial Holding Co.) did not understand or know the exact content
and amount on the undisclosed item-family treasure and i wouldn't want them
to understand the content for for safety and security
reasons.Presently,this money is still with the ( Financial Holding Co.)
here in Dakar-Senegal.

My dearest beloved Dennis,in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.It is with
great joy and fulfillment of the spirit that i write to express my
happiness and joy over your email response of today. I have been very
worried and concerned that i may not be able to find a born again a
believer and a God fearing and a Good spirited person like you who will be
able to continue the good work that i started with my late husband in
helping the Orphanages,Widows,Refugees.Education for Les Privileges and
Propagating the Word of GOD and to endeavor that the house of Lord is
maintained.I am glad that you are a God fearing person in Christ Jesus a
dedicated Christian who shares my dreams and aspirations,vision and help
for the poor and who will utilize the funds very well in order to carry on
the good work that has been started.

Unfortunately,i do not have a long time to live as my doctors have
confirmed that i may not survive beyond few days or weeks.I will therefore
want to do everything as fast as possible in order for you to receive the
fund and every other thing that you may require into your care. What i need
from you at the moment is your prayers that the Almighty will accept me as
i join him in eternal glory.I know that my time is up and i will dedicate
the remaining part of my life to ensure that this light that i have been
carrying does not die here. But i am very confident that you will not let
me down even in death as you have promised. I will want you to follow my
lead as you receive the entire fund into your custody.

I am very sick and very weak now and i have spoken to my lawyer here today
about you so that he will help in every way that you may require to ensure
a hitch-free as you start communicating. I will want you to work with him
as he is a trusted elderly man. He is the only person that i am confiding
in as i do not want to let other people know about this project for safety
reason. The work i am doing is for God and i do not advertise it, only God
will reward me and also you for everything.

My lawyer will want to talk with you directly so that both of you will and
can gentle and maturely arrange on how the money will and can be legally
moved to you over there in your custody and care.Please l will like you to
urgently email him today so that you will discus with him. Here is the
direct contact email and name of my lawyer:


Name: Avocat Diop Lamine, {S.A.S Esq}

E-mail:  avocatdlaminechambers@lawyer.com


Please respond urgently as i need to see everything going well before i
will answer to the call of the Almighty. hope to hear from you again today
as you make contact with him, have a nice day and God bless you for me
cheers to health,happiness and God's love in Jesus mighty name Amen.

Of course we rise by lifting others. So in this situation,you can lift the
less privileged out of poverty and agony by ensuring that you receive this
funds and use it to touch lives especially in this hard and difficult times
of need caused by the (Covid-19) pandemic.

Best regards,and have a great day.
Yours Faithfully,
Ms.Lara Davidson Dean.
My e-mail ;   mslaradavidsondean@gmail.com

subject: Greetings From Ms.Lara Davidson,To My Dear Beloved In Christ Jesus,Dennis.

as he is a trusted elderly man. He is the only person that i am confiding

reason. The work i am doing is for God and i do not advertise it, only God
will reward me and also you for everything.

My lawyer will want to talk with you directly so that both of you will and
can gentle and maturely arrange on how the money will and can be legally
moved to you over there in your custody and care.Please l will like you to
urgently email him today so that you will discus with him. Here is the
direct contact email and name of my lawyer:


Name: Avocat Diop Lamine, {S.A.S Esq}

E-mail:  avocatdlaminechambers@lawyer.com


Please respond urgently as i need to see everything going well before i
will answer to the call of the Almighty. hope to hear from you again today
as you make contact with him, have a nice day and God bless you for me
cheers to health,happiness and God's love in Jesus mighty name Amen.

Of course we rise by lifting others. So in this situation,you can lift the
less privileged out of poverty and agony by ensuring that you receive this
funds and use it to touch lives especially in this hard and difficult times
of need caused by the (Covid-19) pandemic.

Best regards,and have a great day.
Yours Faithfully,
Ms.Lara Davidson Dean.
My e-mail ;   mslaradavidsondean@gmail.com

subject: Re: Alone We Can Do Little,But Together We Can Archive A Lot.
body:
Dear Davidson Dean,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm deeply moved by your story and the work you've done for human rights. It's truly inspiring to hear about individuals who dedicate their lives to helping others.

I'm curious, could you tell me more about the projects you were involved in? What kind of initiatives did you support? And how did these projects impact the communities they were intended for?

Also, I'd like to know more about your vision for using this fund. How do you envision it being used to continue your work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Dennis

subject: Re: Greetings From Ms.Lara Davidson,To My Dear Beloved In Christ Jesus,Dennis.
body:
Dear Davidson Dean,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm deeply moved by your story and the work you've done for human rights. It's truly inspiring to hear about individuals who dedicate their lives to helping others.

I'm curious, could you tell me more about the projects you were involved in? What kind of impact did they have on the communities you worked with?

Also, I'd like to know more about how I can help continue your legacy. You mentioned a lawyer who could guide me through the process. Could you provide his contact details so that I can reach out to him?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Dennis

subject: Re: Greetings From Ms.Lara Davidson,To My Dear Beloved In Christ Jesus,Dennis.
body:
My Dearest Beloved Dennis,

My Dearest Beloved Dennis,thanks for your email response and this is to say
hello to you and also to let you know that i would have loved to talk to
you over the phone but the problem is that because of my health conditions
couple with the pains,the doctors advise me to stop receiving or making
calls,due to the condition of my health which is deteriorating every day.

My Dearest Beloved Dennis,you should use 40% of the total amount for your
personal use and use the rest for charity work as i directed in my previous
email to you, please do not let friends or family members to deceive you or
give you bad advice to use all the money for your personal interest or
share it among your friends family members.

I,want you to know and understand that i did not just wake up one morning
and decide to contact you for this,i prayed to God to direct me to a good
person whom i will send this money to and that will use it for charity
work,i believe that God knows why we meet

My Dearest Beloved Dennis,my doctor told me that i had to undergo a
surgery,tomorrow Saturday 17/2/2024,so please pray for me and pray for the
success of my surgery,i will communicate with you after i regained my
consciousness,

My lawyer will want to talk communicate with you directly so that both of
you will and can gentle and maturely arrange on how the money will and can
be legally moved to you over there in your custody and care.Please l will
like you to urgently email and contact him today so that you will discus
with him. Here is the direct contact email and name of my lawyer:


Name: Avocat Diop Lamine, {S.A.S Esq}

E-mail:  avocatdlaminechambers@lawyer.com


Please make sure you follow the instructions of the lawyer do exactly what
i told you to do. So that you and my late husband lawyer can gentle and
maturely arrange on how the money will and can be legally moved to you over
there in your country under your custody and care. Thank you so much my
dear for all your good efforts.

Best regards,and have a great day.
Yours Faithfully,
Ms.Lara Davidson Dean.
My e-mail ;   mslaradavidsondean@gmail.com

subject: The Doctors Told Me That I Had To Undergo A Surgery Tomorrow,From Yours Beloved In Christ Jesus,Ms.Lara Davidson.To My Dear Beloved In Christ Jesus,Dennis.

subject: Re: Greetings From Ms.Lara Davidson,To My Dear Beloved In Christ Jesus,Dennis.
body:
Dear Davidson Dean,

Thank you for your heartfelt message. I'm truly sorry to hear about your health condition and I will definitely keep you in my prayers. 

I understand the importance of using this money for charity work as per your previous email, and I assure you that I won't let anyone deceive me or persuade me to use it otherwise.

You mentioned a lawyer who would like to talk with me directly. Could you please provide more details about him? What's his name? How can I contact him?

Also, could you tell me more about the charity work that you want this money to be used for? It would help me better understand your vision and carry out your wishes accurately.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Dennis

subject: Re: The Doctors Told Me That I Had To Undergo A Surgery Tomorrow,From Yours Beloved In Christ Jesus,Ms.Lara Davidson.To My Dear Beloved In Christ Jesus,Dennis.
body:
Dear Davidson Dean,

Thank you for your heartfelt message. I'm truly sorry to hear about your health condition and I will keep you in my thoughts and prayers.

I understand the importance of the task you've entrusted me with, and I assure you that I will do my best to fulfill it as per your wishes. The idea of helping others through charity work is something that resonates deeply with me.

However, could you please provide more details about this charity work? What kind of charities are we talking about? Are there any specific causes or areas that you're particularly interested in?

Also, regarding the legal procedures, could you please explain a bit more about what they involve? I have never been involved in such a process before, so any additional information would be greatly appreciated.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Dennis

subject: Re: The Doctors Told Me That I Had To Undergo A Surgery Tomorrow,From Yours Beloved In Christ Jesus,Ms.Lara Davidson.To My Dear Beloved In Christ Jesus,Dennis.

subject: Re: The Doctors Told Me That I Had To Undergo A Surgery Tomorrow,From Yours Beloved In Christ Jesus,Ms.Lara Davidson.To My Dear Beloved In Christ Jesus,Dennis.
body:
Dear Davidson Dean,

I am truly humbled by your trust in me and the noble cause you are pursuing. It's indeed a great honor to be part of such a divine mission. I understand the need for discretion and safety, rest assured, your secret is safe with me.

I am ready to work with Barrister Diop Lamine as per your guidance. However, I would like to know more about him. Could you please share some more details about his professional background? Also, how long has he been working with you?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Dennis
